name: Subsemigroup.coe_centralizer
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
S : Set M
inst✝ : Semigroup M
⊢ Eq (↑(Subsemigroup.centralizer S)) S.centralizer
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp, norm_cast)]
theorem coe_centralizer : ↑(centralizer S) = S.centralizer :=
  rfl

name: AddSubsemigroup.coe_centralizer
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
S : Set M
inst✝ : AddSemigroup M
⊢ Eq (↑(AddSubsemigroup.centralizer S)) S.addCentralizer
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp, norm_cast)]
theorem coe_centralizer : ↑(centralizer S) = S.centralizer :=
  rfl

name: Subsemigroup.mem_centralizer_iff
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
S : Set M
inst✝ : Semigroup M
z : M
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Subsemigroup.centralizer S) z) (∀ (g : M), Membership.mem S g → Eq (HMul.hMul g z) (HMul.hMul z g))
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem mem_centralizer_iff {z : M} : z ∈ centralizer S ↔ ∀ g ∈ S, g * z = z * g :=
  Iff.rfl

name: AddSubsemigroup.mem_centralizer_iff
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
S : Set M
inst✝ : AddSemigroup M
z : M
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (AddSubsemigroup.centralizer S) z) (∀ (g : M), Membership.mem S g → Eq (HAdd.hAdd g z) (HAdd.hAdd z g))
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem mem_centralizer_iff {z : M} : z ∈ centralizer S ↔ ∀ g ∈ S, g * z = z * g :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Subsemigroup.center_le_centralizer
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : Semigroup M
S : Set M
⊢ LE.le (Subsemigroup.center M) (Subsemigroup.centralizer S)
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem center_le_centralizer (S) : center M ≤ centralizer S :=
  S.center_subset_centralizer

name: AddSubsemigroup.center_le_centralizer
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : AddSemigroup M
S : Set M
⊢ LE.le (AddSubsemigroup.center M) (AddSubsemigroup.centralizer S)
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem center_le_centralizer (S) : center M ≤ centralizer S :=
  S.center_subset_centralizer

name: Subsemigroup.centralizer_le
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
S T : Set M
inst✝ : Semigroup M
h : HasSubset.Subset S T
⊢ LE.le (Subsemigroup.centralizer T) (Subsemigroup.centralizer S)
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem centralizer_le (h : S ⊆ T) : centralizer T ≤ centralizer S :=
  Set.centralizer_subset h

name: AddSubsemigroup.centralizer_le
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
S T : Set M
inst✝ : AddSemigroup M
h : HasSubset.Subset S T
⊢ LE.le (AddSubsemigroup.centralizer T) (AddSubsemigroup.centralizer S)
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem centralizer_le (h : S ⊆ T) : centralizer T ≤ centralizer S :=
  Set.centralizer_subset h

name: AddSubsemigroup.centralizer_eq_top_iff_subset
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : AddSemigroup M
s : Set M
⊢ Iff (Eq (AddSubsemigroup.centralizer s) Top.top) (HasSubset.Subset s ↑(AddSubsemigroup.center M))
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
theorem centralizer_eq_top_iff_subset {s : Set M} : centralizer s = ⊤ ↔ s ⊆ center M :=
  SetLike.ext'_iff.trans Set.centralizer_eq_top_iff_subset

name: Subsemigroup.centralizer_eq_top_iff_subset
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : Semigroup M
s : Set M
⊢ Iff (Eq (Subsemigroup.centralizer s) Top.top) (HasSubset.Subset s ↑(Subsemigroup.center M))
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
theorem centralizer_eq_top_iff_subset {s : Set M} : centralizer s = ⊤ ↔ s ⊆ center M :=
  SetLike.ext'_iff.trans Set.centralizer_eq_top_iff_subset

name: Subsemigroup.centralizer_univ
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : Semigroup M
⊢ Eq (Subsemigroup.centralizer Set.univ) (Subsemigroup.center M)
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
theorem centralizer_univ : centralizer Set.univ = center M :=
  SetLike.ext' (Set.centralizer_univ M)

name: AddSubsemigroup.centralizer_univ
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : AddSemigroup M
⊢ Eq (AddSubsemigroup.centralizer Set.univ) (AddSubsemigroup.center M)
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
theorem centralizer_univ : centralizer Set.univ = center M :=
  SetLike.ext' (Set.centralizer_univ M)

name: Subsemigroup.closure_le_centralizer_centralizer
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : Semigroup M
s : Set M
⊢ LE.le (Subsemigroup.closure s) (Subsemigroup.centralizer ↑(Subsemigroup.centralizer s))
decl:
variable {M} in
@[to_additive]
lemma closure_le_centralizer_centralizer (s : Set M) :
    closure s ≤ centralizer (centralizer s) :=
  closure_le.mpr Set.subset_centralizer_centralizer

name: AddSubsemigroup.closure_le_centralizer_centralizer
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : AddSemigroup M
s : Set M
⊢ LE.le (AddSubsemigroup.closure s) (AddSubsemigroup.centralizer ↑(AddSubsemigroup.centralizer s))
decl:
variable {M} in
@[to_additive]
lemma closure_le_centralizer_centralizer (s : Set M) :
    closure s ≤ centralizer (centralizer s) :=
  closure_le.mpr Set.subset_centralizer_centralizer
